main event: A pilot observed a white light changing to red while flying over Bryan, Texas, suspecting it to be a missile firing.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on two different days, 16 May 63 and 16 Nov 61., The pilot was flying a T-33 at an altitude of 20,000 feet during the observation., The object was initially at a height of 3,200 feet before descending., There is a mention of potential missile activity associated with the sighting., The report includes military references and mentions Project Blue Book.
witness description: a military pilot flying a T-33
